info.name: TheRealReal-TestLibrary
info.description:
This collection houses reusable queries and mutations with their assertions and default dynamic variable inputs.

This folder should be up to date with the schema

exec: pm.test("Response body does not contain error", () => {

request.description: currently hardcoded with 'password1' as that is the password being set in V2 > createUser

exec: pm.test("Response body does not contain error", () => {

graphql.query:
mutation provideAdditionalInfo ($input: ProvideAdditionalInfoInput!) {
    provideAdditionalInfo (input: $input) {
        accountId
        bankAccountId
        hasProvidedAdditionalInfo
        isKycRestricted
        kycCompleted
        kycRequirements
        kycStatusMessage
        legalFirstName
        legalLastName
        needsVerificationRequirements
        verificationStatus
    }
}

mutation provideAdditionalInfoWithOtp ($input: ProvideAdditionalInfoInput!) {
    provideAdditionalInfoWithOtp (input: $input) {
        accountId
        bankAccountId
        hasProvidedAdditionalInfo
        isKycRestricted
        kycCompleted
        kycRequirements
        kycStatusMessage
        legalFirstName
        legalLastName
        needsVerificationRequirements
        verificationStatus
    }
}

mutation createUserAddress ($input: CreateUserAddressInput!) {
    createUserAddress (input: $input) {
        address {
            active
            address1
            address2
            addressId
            alternativePhone
            city
            country
            countryDetails {
                id
                iso
                iso3
                name
            }
            defaultFor
            firstName
            id
            insertedAt
            lastName
            phone
            postalCode
            state
            stateDetails {
                id
                iso
                name
            }
            type
            userAddressId
            zipCode
        }
    }
}

exec: pm.test("Response body does not contain error", () => {

graphql.query:
mutation createInquiry ($includeLockers: Boolean, $input: CreateInquiryInput!) {
    createInquiry (input: $input) {
        id
        inquiry {
            address {
                active
                address1
                address2
                addressId
                alternativePhone
                city
                country
                countryDetails {
                    id
                    iso
                    iso3
                    name
                }
                defaultFor
                firstName
                id
                insertedAt
                lastName
                phone
                postalCode
                state
                stateDetails {
                    id
                    iso
                    name
                }
                type
                userAddressId
                zipCode
            }
            appointment {
                address {
                    address1
                    address2
                    addressTypes
                    city
                    country
                    defaultFor
                    externalId
                    firstName
                    id
                    lastName
                    phone
                    postalCode
                    state
                    zipCode
                }
                firstTextReminder
                id
                secondTextReminder
                service {
                    apiName
                    description
                    hours
                    id
                    minutes
                    name
                }
                startDateTime
                startDateTimeText
                timeZone
                updateLink
            }
            availableChannels
            availableSites (includeLockers: $includeLockers) {
                address {
                    address1
                    address2
                    addressTypes
                    city
                    country
                    defaultFor
                    externalId
                    firstName
                    id
                    lastName
                    phone
                    postalCode
                    state
                    zipCode
                }
                alphaEnabled
                apiName
                appointletUrl
                distanceInMiles
                email
                externalId
                id
                isLocker
                location {
                    latitude
                    longitude
                }
                mapUrl
                name
                openHours
                schedulingLocationId
                shortName
                store
                storeId
                storeImageUrl
                url
            }
            channel
            contactId
            contactOwnerId
            email
            firstInquiry
            firstName
            funnelCompleted
            gdprUser
            hearAboutUs
            id
            lastName
            leadDetails
            leadSource
            leadSubSource
            method
            mobilePhone
            phone
            postalCode
            provider {
                address {
                    active
                    address1
                    address2
                    addressId
                    alternativePhone
                    city
                    country
                    countryDetails {
                        id
                        iso
                        iso3
                        name
                    }
                    defaultFor
                    firstName
                    id
                    insertedAt
                    lastName
                    phone
                    postalCode
                    state
                    stateDetails {
                        id
                        iso
                        name
                    }
                    type
                    userAddressId
                    zipCode
                }
                contractComplete
                contractDonationAddendumComplete
                email
                externalId
                firstName
                id
                lastName
                phone
                servicesOffered
                userExternalId
            }
            referenceNumber
            shippingLabelReady
            site
            slug
            tosAcceptedAt
            trafficType
            type
        }
    }
}

}

mutation finalizeConsignment ($input: FinalizeConsignmentInput!) {
    finalizeConsignment (input: $input) {
        authorizationToken
        opportunity {
            accountId
            address {
                active

                address2
                addressId
                alternativePhone
                city
                country
                countryDetails {
                    id

                    iso3
                    name

                defaultFor

                id
                insertedAt
                lastName
                phone
                postalCode
                state
                stateDetails {
                    id
                    iso
                    name
                }
                type
                userAddressId
                zipCode

            bypassAutoAssignment
            channel
            closeDate
            contact {
                address {
                    active
                    address1
                    address2
                    addressId
                    alternativePhone
                    city
                    country
                    countryDetails {
                        id
                        iso
                        iso3
                        name
                    }
                    defaultFor

                        id
                        iso
                        name

                contractComplete
                contractDonationAddendumComplete
                email
                externalId
                firstName
                id
                lastName
                phone
                servicesOffered
                userExternalId
            }
            contactId
            externalId
            funnelCompleted
            id
            items {
                designer {
                    id
                    name
                    restriction
                    slug
                    type
                }
                taxon {
                    id
                    name
                    parentId
                    permalink
                    seoName
                    seoPermalink
                }
            }
            lastModifiedDate
            leadSource
            name
            referenceNumber
            shippingLabel {
                carrier {
                    name
                }
                destination {
                    active
                    address1
                    address2
                    addressId
                    alternativePhone
                    city
                    country
                    countryDetails {
                        id
                        iso
                        iso3
                        name
                    }
                    defaultFor
                    firstName
                    id
                    insertedAt
                    lastName
                    phone
                    postalCode
                    state
                    stateDetails {
                        id
                        iso
                        name
                    }
                    type
                    userAddressId
                    zipCode
                }
                url
            }
            slug
            stage
        }

}
